There are no shadows under context menus or menus when using a 3rd party visual style.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Use a 3rd party visual style (http://browse.deviantart.com/customization/skins/windows7/visualstyle/)
2. Open the firefox menu or context menu
3.

Actual Results:  
There are no shadows.

Expected Results:  
There should be shadows.
